content: this cuddly creature is here for your needs when you re feeling down just give him a squeeze he ll keep all your secrets and tell you no lies and he fits in your hand- just the right size so when you re feeling lonely give doc a call you won t make a better decision at all this pattern takes around an hour to complete and is great for crocheters of all skill levels the surface crochet to add the tentacles is much easier than it sounds and its a great way to learn the basic technique each octopus takes roughly 80 yards of blanket yarn and you ll also need two 6mm safety eyes and stuffing
